meaningMnemonic: You <radical>say</radical> stuff to a <radical>river</radical>, giving it <kanji>instruction</kanji>. This river is a new river so it needs you to say things, giving it instruction on what to do. Otherwise the river wouldn’t know how to behave.
readingMnemonic: While giving <kanji>instruction</kanji> to the river, you see a small boat coming down it. Inside the miniature boat is a rac<reading>coon</reading> (くん) captain and his raccoon crew. The raccoon captain is instructing them, “Stroke! Stroke!”
